mapper.update: UPDATE usercoupontimes SET couponTimes=#{couponTimes} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usercoupontimes (id, userCode, couponTimes, createTime, updateTime, operatorId, operatorName) VALUE (#{id}, #{userCode}, #{couponTimes}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorName})
